meanings.definition: A type of Japanese dumpling filled with ground meat and vegetables, wrapped in a thin dough and typically pan-fried.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat gyozas with my friends at the Japanese restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chef made a delicious batch of gyozas for the customers.
meanings.sent3: When the gyozas started dancing in the pan, everyone laughed.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling gyozas filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown gyozas glistened under the restaurant lights, tempting all who passed by.
